policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: MessageComplete"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="request.shared.serviceName"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetOutputVariablePrefix stringValue="serviceName"/>
                </L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                <L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="request.shared.orgId"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetOutputVariablePrefix stringValue="orgId"/>
                </L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                <L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="request.shared.serviceUrl"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetOutputVariablePrefix stringValue="serviceUrl"/>
                </L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                <L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="request.shared.serviceOid"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetOutputVariablePrefix stringValue="serviceOid"/>
                </L7p:LookupDynamicContextVariables>
                <L7p:OtelMeter>
                    <L7p:Attributes mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="serviceOid"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${serviceOid.output}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="org"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${orgId.output}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="service_name"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${serviceName.output}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="serviceUrl"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${serviceUrl.output}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Attributes>
                    <L7p:Description stringValue="Service usage by Org"/>
                    <L7p:Name stringValue="usage_by_org"/>
                    <L7p:Type type="COUNTER"/>
                </L7p:OtelMeter>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:Detail stringValue="Unknown service"/>
            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
